title: BONUS: BobbyCast  #267 - Battle of the Songs With the Same Title + Kevin Griffin of Better Than Ezra Celebrates 25 Year Anniversary of No. 1 Song
itunes:title: BONUS: BobbyCast  #267 - Battle of the Songs With the Same Title + Kevin Griffin of Better Than Ezra Celebrates 25 Year Anniversary of No. 1 Song
description:
Bobby and Eddie face off in Battle of the Songs with the Same Title. Bobby Bones talks to Kevin Griffin, the lead singer of Better Than Ezra. They just celebrated the 25th anniversary of their song “Good” going No. 1 and just released brand new music for the first time in 2 years. We put TWO songs with the same and picked which one is the better son and which performed better on the Billboard Hot 100.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
